titles.title: Natural Disaster Recovery Program Act of 2024
Natural Disaster Recovery Program Act of 2024
Natural Disaster Recovery Program Act of 2024
To authorize the President to provide disaster assistance to States and Indian Tribes under a major disaster recovery program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management.
Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management Discharged
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute by the Yeas and Nays: 33 - 28.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. H. Rept. 118-811.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 663.
